title: Making yourself understood: introduction to communication
creator_credit: John T. Bobbitt and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Language written or spoken, is our principle tool of communication. Essentials for communication - communicator, content, medium, audience, response. Knowing the type of audience being addressed is essential to getting your message across, and to getting the response you desire.
